Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-262.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 396.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to designate the visitor center at Jean Lafitte National Historical Park in New Orleans, Louisiana as the "Laura C. Hudson Visitor Center."

summary.text: Designates the visitor center at Jean Lafitte National Historical Park located at 419 Rue Decatur in New Orleans, Louisiana, as the Laura C. Hudson Visitor Center.

titles.title: A bill to designate the visitor center at Jean Lafitte National Historical Park in New Orleans, Louisiana as the "Laura C. Hudson Visitor Center."
